    class  Bishop
    Defines the properties and behavior of the Queen piece

    Defines the properties and behavior of the King piece
    class  Knight
    Defines the properties and behavior of the Queen piece

    Defines the properties and behavior of the Pawn piece

    Defines the properties and behavior of the Queen piece

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Piece Board.lastPiece
    A Piece object that holds the piece from the last move

    Overloaded updateBoard method to handle enpassant move

    Updates the 2D board list after a certain piece has been moved
